entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Vector.Create #94384
  • MemoryMappedViewAccessor: Dispose flushes on temporary files #94383
  • Blazor WASM NET 6.0 app fail to build with NET8 RC2 SDK under Framework #94379

Closed

  • Configuration binder failing on 7.0-alpine on GCP Kubernetes #94336
    9.0.0
  • Determine whether running in NativeAOT at runtime #94380
  • API Proposal: Unsafe.IsNullRef(ref readonly) #73608
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix passing message as paramName #94389
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • Provide System.Windows.Extensions package readme #94388
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Merge return true/false blocks #94387
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][interp] When local space overflows, retry compilation with optimization enabled #94381
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Clean up S.N.Tensors project in main #94378
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors

Merged

  • Fixed xml-doc comments in OptionsServiceCollectionExtensions.AddOptionsWithValidateOnStart #94385
    area-Extensions-Options, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] Bump chrome for testing - linux: 119.0.6045.105, windows: 119.0.6045.105 #94377
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, area-codeflow

Updated

  • Add `WidenLatin1ToUtf16_MisalignedAddress` #90319
    area-System.Text.Encoding, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 9.0.0
  • Implements new `int`and `long` overloads for `TimeSpan` #94143
    new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, area-System.DateTime, 9.0.0
  • Lock that uses congestion detection for self-tuning #93879
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation
  • JIT: Remove BBJ_NONE #94239
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Create a managed implementation of assembly binder #91400
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Haiku: Initial CoreCLR support #93907
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution, os-haiku
  • Sanitize Reg Entries in SerialPort.GetPortNames (Issue 93240) #93242
    community-contribution, area-System.IO.Ports
  • Update NotNullIfNotNull documentation #93750
    area-Meta

    untriaged, Area-CLI

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Modifier Order Refactoring appears incorrect #70702
  • Collection expressions: CS0121 ambiguous call between `string` and `char[]` #70701

PullRequests

Updated

  • Support implicit indexer access in object initializers #70649

    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper, plaintext #51884
  • Support configuring the local development environment name #51883
  • Center and fade in the default loading screen. #51879
  • Perf regression: ApiCrudUpdateProduct #51878
  • SignalR ts client transport has unexpected behaviour about transport when calling withUrl() twice #51876

Closed

  • Change behaviour for custom protocol links in blazor apps #29259
    Planning: WebUI
  • Blazor JS Interop Takes 1 min to throw exception #38501
    Planning: WebUI
  • Multiple cascading parameters update from child component issue #26465
    Planning: WebUI
  • Perf improvement: caching, mvc #51877
  • Request Delegate Generator: CS1750 error output with optional CancellationToken parameter #51882
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudDeleteProduct #51872
  • Perf regression: json #51871

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix ambiguous route analyzer false positive with switch #51881
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1
  • Fix ambiguous route analyzer false positive with action replacement #51880
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1
  • SignalR transport has unexpected behaviour about transport when calling withUrl() twice #51875
    area-signalr, community-contribution

Updated

  • Blazor web csharp template #51030
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, Planning: WebUI

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Android] Border inside frame cause dont render content #18526

Closed

  • exception throw for 'Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Shapes.Shape" #13823
  • Shell back navigation not working #14681
  • dotnet publish does not find keystore #15279
  • Request to back port fix into .NET 7 #17921

PullRequests

Created

  • Add unit tests to verify button's command is not messing up with manually set IsEnabled #18525

Updated

  • [Catalyst] Allow to use a custom WKUIDelegate on WebView #18483
    t/bug, platform/macOS 🍏, area/controls 🎮, control-webview, Under Consideration
  • Resizetizer issues fixes - nuget bumps #16100
    area/single project ☝️, stale, Under Consideration
  • Improves performance of GetLayoutHandlerIndex #18499
    area/layout 🔲, area/perf 🏎️, community ✨

    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Added orientation property to slider #18057
    do-not-merge, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, s/pr-needs-author-input, stale, .NET 9 Planning
